title: 求教这里的MOD如何下载！
author: 喵咪咪
txt_content:
http://www.minecraftforum.net/topic/182918-173smp-flans-mods-planes-ww2-guns-vehicles-moods-mputils-teams166/

就是这里的。。。开谷歌太蛋疼了。。  十分想下载那个灰机MOD！  谁能告诉下详细的谢谢了！

replies.author: well
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 well 于 2011-7-21 04:10 编辑 

我放到網盤了... 去下載吧... 
Planes 1.7.3 v15.zip 及相關文件
http://dl.dbank.com/c0nrddf3gp

或是... 參考一下這帖子... 
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-7132-1-1.html


安裝方法:
Client
1. Download & Install Risugami's ModLoader 
2. Download & Install SDK's ModLoaderMp 
3. Download & Install GaryCXJk's Turbo Model Thingy
4. (Optional)Download & Install Risugami's AudioMod
5. Download Planes v15 
6. Add the contents of the "jar files" folder to the minecraft.jar
7. Add the contents of the "resource files" to the resources folder
8. Drag planes.txt into the .minecraft folder
9. Delete META-INF folder, if you didn't already
10. Play!
